Infinitum Framework

Packages 
Package Description
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity
Provides the classes necessary for Activity injection and autowiring.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity.annotation
Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum Activity injection framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop
Provides the classes necessary for aspect-oriented programming.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.annotation
Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum AOP framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.context
Provides the classes necessary for configuring the Infinitum AOP module.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.context.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the AOP context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context
Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.exception
Provides exception classes for the context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di
Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.annotation
Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum DI framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the DI framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event
Provides the classes necessary for the event framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.annotation
Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum event framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.event.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the event framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.exception
Provides general framework-wide exception classes.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal
Provides internal utility classes.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal.caching
Provides internal utility classes for caching.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging
Provides classes pertaining to the logging framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the logging framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm
Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.annotation
Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum ORM.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context
Provides the classes necessary for configuring the Infinitum ORM module.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.context.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the ORM context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria
Provides classes for the criteria API, which is used to construct database queries based on objects rather than SQL.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion
Provides the criterion classes, which together form a Criteria query.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.exception
Provides exception classes for the ORM framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.internal
Provides internal ORM utility classes.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.internal.bind
Provides classes containing internally bound values.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence
Provides the classes necessary for mapping and persisting data between domain objects and database tables.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the persistence framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.relationship
Provides the classes necessary to model entity relationships.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest
Provides the classes necessary for RESTful object-relational mapping.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.rest.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful ORM framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql
Provides utility classes for constructing and executing SQL statements.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite
Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection
Provides reflection classes for analyzing project source code at runtime.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the reflection framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.context
Provides the classes necessary for configuring the Infinitum UI module.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.context.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the UI context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.widget
Provides UI widget classes.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.ui.widget.impl
Provides concrete implementations for UI widgets.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web
Provides classes for HTTP communication.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.context
Provides the classes necessary for configuring the Infinitum Web module.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.context.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the Web context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.impl
Provides concrete implementations for HTTP communication.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest
Provides the classes necessary for communicating with RESTful web services.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.web.rest.impl
Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.
